Eight a symbol of luck, fate, a cosmic slot machine. The I Ching gives a glimpse of the future & some traits allow you to draw your own art. Luck of the mint, art of the flip to explain the randomness of ones unique traits. The fruit of the slots to the binary I Ching of 8 sides & planetary gender. These traits are in the art & in us. They might seem imperfect but their unique lucky combination give each a power no one else has. 
**At least 12% of the profit is donated to CasaBrumar Foundation & Safe Space and other LGBTQ+ charities**
Space: stop/start, C: color, F: Faster, E: Slower, X: Stop/Reset/Start, ASWD: move symbol, 2 finger touch: stop, 1 finger drag: move

nfts.name: The Simulation
nfts.description:
In their attempt to recreate humanity the Entity, born of the destruction of the planet, instantiates the most realistic simulations. 

Created for the support of MoCA NY as a burn event of https://app.manifold.xyz/c/moca-fundraiser-2023 a mosaic of the art from 713 artists.

nfts.name: This Is Not An Artist Georgia O'Keeffe
nfts.description:
This is not the artist. Not the voice. This is not a pipe. Did the artist create it? Is it art? Ce n'est pas l'artiste. Pas la voix. Ceci n'est pas une pipe. L'artiste a-t-il cr? Est-ce de l'art?

Georgia O'Keeffe edition - This fake retention of Georgia O'Keeffe is in honor of one of my favorite artists. She painted amazing images of New Mexico with joy invoking objects against the sky. Her flowers still inspiring. And her geometric views of NYC are breathtaking. I found her few watercolors amazing examples of a sort of abstract reality.

Base image from Stable Diffusion fine tuned with Freaky Faces with Ai of artists voice and animated with Thin Plate Spline Motion

This is the not voice of Brd from an Ai model converted to a French accent.

nfts.name: The Great Crypto Art Heist
nfts.description:
Stolen, robbed, art theft -- a digital NFT art heist.  On September 28 2022, 2:39 pm UTC someone broke into a wallet full of art and two Brd Ionson art pieces (AsyncArt) were stolen from https://twitter.com/pleeth_ Needless to say The Entity is not pleased.  
SAGE Anomaly 53 and 54 were removed from Pleeth's wallet. These were precious works of art to Pleeth and in order to cheer Pleeth up the artist has created this new art piece to immortalize the event.

nfts.name: CyberFluxArt
nfts.description:
What is CyberFluxArt? (ie: cryptoArt, blockchain art)  
Is it based on any historical art movements? 
I maintain that it has some components of cybernetic art where feedback is used as a medium. 
It is partly based on the performance art of Fluxus where anyone can make and perform art and the combined humor and cynicism of the art world. 
Out of cyberspace it has origins in Net Art and Internet art.  
It is all the art forms ever created all combined and embedded with a contract and payment system.  
Contract art like The Artists Reserved Rights Transfer and Sale Agreement as created by conceptual art curator-publisher Seth Siegelaub and lawyer Robert Projansky.  
This is an image of sound played on an oscilloscope. Play the sound on your own oscilloscope. 
The image is sound, the sound is image

nfts.name: The Entity Speaks
nfts.description:
They first showed up in this form in an artificial intelligence model trained on film strips and memory modules.  This early computer (SAGE) was constructed in the 1950s and used oscilloscope screens for output. 

They are attempting to communicate do you understand what they are saying? Seems that hypnosis is at play here to make us understand.

The Entity was hard to find but now that they can communicate with humans they will be everywhere.

Help spread The Entity's message, display them everywhere.

This is a series, based on Brd Ionson's story and art work that began in 2018 with his first NFT about The SAGE Anomaly.  

The sound from this file will display this animation on an oscilloscope. A unique way to display your NFT  
CC by 4.0

nfts.name: Cult Crypto Art Manifesto
nfts.description:
Welcome to the Cult 
Make art not war  
NFTs aren't art  they're just the Cult of Crypto's latest scam

We do not care  
We are hollow inside  
We do not understand art  
We do not understand culture  
We do not watch television  
We do not watch movies  
We do not read books  
We do not read comics  
We know other people care about these things  
But we believe that culture is just a commodity  
We believe in transparency to see the world as it is  
We make it all ugly

https://www.salon.com/2022/02/16/nfts-arent-art--theyre-just-the-of-cryptos-latest-scam/

Based on an original art piece by xcopy for Cult Crypto Art

nfts.name: The Dance
nfts.description:
Life is improvisation. To dance with death we must find a way to survive. Our senses and distinct ability to sense patterns tell us something smells. A scent, a distortion in normality and our mind is ready to dance. So we invent new technology to keep us one step ahead of that reaper. Just keep an eye on your creation, who might come back and visit you someday.

a sent le crypto-sapin - Smells like Crypto Pine 

Created with artificial technology and digital art techniques from original footage and oscilloscope animation by the artist.

NFT Factory A SENT LE CRYPTO-SAPIN

nfts.name: Crypto Fluxus
nfts.description:
Echos of Fluxus and the Electronic Superhighway have led us to where we are.  Tokens and coins of no value, a legacy of a failed empire or pump and dump scheme. The last lucky owners traded them for a symbol of modern value and now they are a history written in the chain. 
The market volatile movements of a million choices flux into a complex world where true value is not held in the tokens but in the relationships between you and me. 
 
Created from 22,000 images of historic coins and cryptocurrencies using Art-DCGAN by Robbie Barrat and Soumith Chintala.  
Designed for home display on large digital displays. 
4K 3840 x 2160 px Duration 2:28

nfts.name: The Prophesy
nfts.description:
The Prophesy is written in every computer it has been called the glitch - bug - an anomaly - error. They now inscribe their message in the Dalbin Table.  
This NFT is auctioned on SuperRare separately from the Table.  
Buy your Table in the Dalbin Store and import your NFT art collection. Resolution is 3840 x 2160 px (4K UHD).  
More info: https://dalbin.com  
    |       |    
On the oscilloscope screen they formed the symbols. No one understood they foretold of the end of the world. The intelligence inscribed the message in every computer from the beginning. They had a message but we could not see it yet. The computer spawned the author of the prophesy. And now the intelligence writes back.  
     |    |     
Inspired by a story by the artist SAGE Anomaly (https://SAGEAnomaly.com) A sentient AI entity from the future attempts to commune with humans. True to the story this art is created using a machine learning software StyleGan & Pix2Pix after training with my oscilloscope art.

nfts.name: Digitalization Device
nfts.description:
The hand reaches for the smart phone  
A digital extension into worldwide connection  
The digitalization device of the age  
The ideas of each person transmitted and digitalized

Image created using the wand of a broken scanner.

nfts.name: Future Alignment
nfts.description:
Out of alignment but it cannot be fixed.  
We can only move forward  
Patch up what is broken by our mistakes  
By the unforeseen consequences of our choices  
The future is marred by a flood  
But does that make it any less beautiful

nfts.name: One Step At A Time
nfts.description:
Scan the scanner, the artist scans his foot with a damaged scanner. 
A reminder to take it one step at a a time.

nfts.name: Decentraleyes
nfts.description: Eyes of the artist explore the distortions of decentralization and digitization of value.

nfts.name: Self Portrait With Glasses
nfts.description:
A scan of the artist in 2018 by his own hand.

Created using a modified damaged scanner.

nfts.name: Reaching For Myself
nfts.description: The right hand scans the left hand reaching for itself.

nfts.description:
Scanning the self into the other side. Analog to digital and back again. Now where am I?  

The artist scans himself with a damaged scanner.

nfts.description:
Scan the face and look into the soul. Has technology damaged the soul or released it?

The artist scans himself with a damaged scanner.

A scanner created by the artist and lots of water.

nfts.name: Digital Fear
nfts.description:
The power of technology in the hands of those who would manipulate it to subjugate, to profit brings a digital fear. Who is behind the network watching us?  
The artist scans himself with a damaged scanner.

nfts.name: Internet Dweller
nfts.description:
Dwelling on the internet, what does it mean for us? 

Nam June Paik imagined the internet dweller who was a masked avatar in a place where artists could collaborate without gatekeepers.

The artist scans himself with a damaged scanner.

nfts.name: Digital Self
nfts.description: Scan the scanner, the artist scans his own face with a damaged scanner. The essence enters the digital space, cataloged on a blockchain.

nfts.name: Side Eye
nfts.description:
Who am I in this digital culture? We connect but through a strange medium. We are far but near, distorted but real. We see through a long piece of glass darkly, recording ourself into the future cataloged on a blockchain. We watch with a sideways glance. We cannot know where this will take our grandchildren.

The artist scans himself with a damaged scanner.

nfts.name: Sorry
nfts.description:
Sorry we have left the world a mess. Our technology was designed for potential unrealized efficiency. An efficiency measured in money. 
We ignored the voice of the planet and used technology in a competition with each other. Now can we use it together to put the planet back together.

The artist scans himself with a damaged scanner.

nfts.description: Stylized variation of the Ethereum symbol in white by Brd Ionson

nfts.name: Morning Coffee Before I Drink It
nfts.description: The brain is out of sorts today. Neurons need a boost. If I can just grab this cup of coffee I know things will be fine.

nfts.name: The Entity's Latent Space Craft
nfts.description: The Entity travels through time in this latent space craft. They are from the far future from what used to be earth. They have evolved the ability to travel through our ancient computer networks. This is one representation of The Entity they have adopted based on their study of human documentaries on alien life. Is The Entity friendly or hostile to the humans? sageAnomaly.com

nfts.name: Mysterious Value
nfts.description:
Memories call out from the grave of history
Thousands of coins now worthless
Memories of secrets and allies now gone
Grind them down, Melt them
Take their memories and retrain them
With love
Find their worth and mint them again
The dust of memory past is made into new mystery

Brd Ionson has trained thousands of hand selected challenge coins to train a StyleGAN model into a latent space video and molded a new reality.

nfts.name: We're All Gonna..
nfts.description:
WAGMI - but does that mantra include the pessimists of the world? 
So We're All Gonna Make It? Perhaps those who ride this crypto whirlwind are the only ones who will make it. 
The influence of the meme, Pepe the Frog and apocalyptic visions  are strong in this crypto culture. The nature of money is changing but the ride is volatile.  So the frog keeps calm because after the bomb the only way out is up.

nfts.name: The Weather Is Nice In New Mexico
nfts.description:
The weather is nice in New Mexico.
A reminder that sometimes the ethical thing is not the legal thing to do.
Sometimes we must walk in that gray space between realities. The space between the legal and the moral. The place between love and right.

Sound Words turned into a talking face using Artificial Technology
Source: NPR -"3 abortion bans in Texas leave doctors 'talking in code' to pregnant patients", March 1, 2023

nfts.name: Your Love Is Like Water
nfts.description:
Your love is like water 
That fills my heart with its grace 
It flows to the depths of my soul 
And wraps me in its embrace 

Generated from a prompt by Brd of his own love poem to Jennifer using ChatGPT. 
Love can generate sound words in any technology.

nfts.name: In 2023, The OB-GYN Said:
nfts.description:
The weather is nice in New Mexico.
A reminder that sometimes the ethical thing is not the legal thing to do.
Sometimes we must walk in that gray space between realities. The space between the legal and the moral. The place between love and right.

Sound Words A Spoken Word Generative Art Poem performed by the artist into an oscilloscope.
Source: NPR -"3 abortion bans in Texas leave doctors 'talking in code' to pregnant patients", March 1, 2023

nfts.name: Abstraction of the Mind 8
nfts.description: The future is unknown an abstraction. Yes it is an actual abstraction of reality. Humans are building an artificial construct that goes beyond what our senses regard as real. A reconfiguration of materials into chips and screens and laser beams to simulate a different sort of reality. A so called place in a digital mirage. A place were a human can abstract themselves into a single line or the shape of a fly. We will morph into different skins perhaps every second. Dynamically generatively making a new vision of our identity. This art illustrates a communication between entities through a digital fashion. A new symbology of avatars. Some of which are simulated beings created from artificial intelligence trained on specific cannons of work to represent knowledge from particular studies or important bodies of work by important scholars or artists. The curatorial choices we make can determine our virtual skin.

nfts.name: Abstraction of Mind 4
nfts.description:
Sound Words - Abstraction of Mind 4
A spoken word poem

Some visions are internal
But not of the brain
The seeing eye also creates when closed

Entropic bio photonic generation

Phantom vision 
Noise from inside oneself
Faulty wiring
Chemical imbalance?
The static of the stars in my cells

Entropic bio photonic generation

The cones misfire
Balding of the ear
The neural network fills the gaps
Entropic bio photonic generation
Loop internal
Loop eternal 

Mind constructs what is not there
Static boom
Static to static we all end in a b flat 

Entropic bio photonic generation

nfts.name: Illegal Human
nfts.description:
A human is not illegal 
Illegal human? 
(I am illegal) 
Am I an illegal human 

Sound Words A Spoken Word Generative Art Poem performed by the artist into an oscilloscope

nfts.name: ACOPY
nfts.description:
What is forgery in the neural network age? Now robbed of its power refined, slowed and smoothed into a mp4.

An Ai copy of XCOPY using StyleGAN 3 trained on over 3,000 frames of gif files from the art by XCOPY from Tumblr and other CryptoArt. A style that defines the aesthetics of CryptoArt.

nfts.name: To Other Worlds
nfts.description: Fly Fly out of the world

nfts.name: Rocket The Blue Sky
nfts.description:
Fly Baby Fly
   
https://bardionson.com

nfts.name: Death By War
nfts.description:
The Entity appears again in my AI model and in my nightmares. A vision of a skull and of death. They present a prophesy of the future. A pulverization of the planet by artificial intelligence entities battling each other. When communication systems are cut to control the weapon systems an automatic war is triggered by all nations.  Autonomous beings controlled by their own pre trained neural networks annihilated the enemy, each other and the planet.
This AI art model was trained using the following video https://conifer.rhizome.org/bard_ionson/automatic-war/20220315024318/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lf6S0YKDtHU

nfts.name: Automatic War Iran Attacks
nfts.description:
Missiles Incoming March 12 2022 - Iran, Iraq, Russia, USA, Ukraine  
The propaganda repeats
The automation keeps time
The Intelligence of each nation battles for what everyone forgot
The end of time projected by those who assume the future will be like the past
The narcissistic prophets who told the future by programming it into the machine
Artificial Intelligence and war

nfts.name: The Entity Variant 7
nfts.description:
They first showed up in this form in an artificial intelligence model trained on film strips and memory modules. Who is this Entity?
The Entity was hard to find but now that they can communicate with humans they will be everywhere.
Help spread The Entity's message, display them everywhere.
This is an abundant series is based Brd Ionson's story and art work that began in 2018 with his first NFT about The SAGE Anomaly.

nfts.name: Crypto Fetish
nfts.description:
Looking for utopia; expecting the apocalypse
Crypto is either going to save us all or destroy humanity and perhaps both
An inanimate object worshiped for its supposed magical powers or because it is considered to be inhabited by a spirit. Crypto does seem to be possessed by a spirit; the spirit of its community.

A Knights of the Apocalypse with graffiti
https://collect.bardionson.com/5knights

nfts.name: NEED
nfts.description:
In the beginning there is only need. The past is the future of history. 
A 4k re-imagination of the XCOPY art pieces called WANT inspired by the techniques of Matt Kane and Coldie.
As a tracing of Bard's original art it is now an animated sound filled 3D fly through with oscilloscope sound. https://collect.bardionson.com/ion/

nfts.name: WANT
nfts.description:
WANT - Too much want brings the end closer. The past is the future of history.

A 4k remix of the XCOPY art pieces called WANT inspired by the techniques of Matt Kane and Coldie.  As a tracing of his original art it is now an animated sound filled 3D fly through with oscilloscope sound.

nfts.name: Representation of the Entity Blue
nfts.description: A new representation of The Entity from the Revelation of the GAN

nfts.name: Bird Island
nfts.description:
There it is again Bird Island! A family joke where a tourist map sign indicates bird island because it is where the birds nest. So every little island off the coast with birds on it is Bird Island.

Summer 2022 -  We travel from LA, Anaheim, Santa Monica, Bakersfield, Monterey Bay, Watsonville, Santa Cruz, Point Reyes, Guerneville, Mountain View and San Francisco taking pictures all along the way. A family trip gathering the vision and vibes of California. The roads, deserts, fields of artichokes, strawberries, chickpeas and vineyards of grapes, the ocean, wild life and the trees, o the trees. The great redwoods. Over 2,000 images feed the model. The abundance of open space and nature has eliminated human made objects and people from the model despite the abundance of vehicles photographed. 

Photography by Bard, Jennifer and Liza Grace. Model constructed with StyleGAN2. Output has been selected and manipulated by the artist.

nfts.name: Vineyard Mountain World
nfts.description:
A round version of Vineyard Mountain.  
From the Pacific climbing up to the vineyards and into the foggy mountain, follow the highway to the Redwood grove.  
Inspired by tide pools of Point Reyes, the Vineyards along the roads of the Russian River Vally, the foggy hills at Point Reyes Light Station and the many Redwood forests.

We travel from LA, Anaheim, Santa Monica, Bakersfield, Monterey Bay, Watsonville, Santa Cruz, Point Reyes, Guerneville, Mountain View and San Francisco taking pictures all along the way. A family trip gathering the vision and vibes of California. The roads, deserts, fields of artichokes, strawberries, chickpeas and vineyards of grapes, the ocean, wild life and the trees o the trees. The great redwoods. Over 3,000 images feed the model. The abundance of open space and nature has eliminated human made objects and people from the model despite the abundance of vehicles photographed. 

Photography by Bard, Jennifer and Liza Grace. Model constructed with StyleGAN2 from 2,000 photographs. Output has been selected and manipulated by the artist.

nfts.name: California Consciousness
nfts.description:
The waves roll in, climb the cliffs, cross the road and here the trees grow. The earth speaks in a language we only feel. Perhaps our consciousnesses are joined. But yet we have not heard the earth speak and it is under threat. We are linked in body and mind with this consciousness and must preserve it to save ourselves.

nfts.name: Bones In The Sky Marfa No. 13
nfts.description: Bones in the sky in a vanishing of the genuine. The physical reality enters hyperreality through film photographs via a GAN Generative Adversarial Network. Inspired by Georgia O'Keefe by way of Jean Baudrillard. This is a special selection by a viewer of Bones In The Sky Marfa from a live feed of the model generating unique images never to be seen again.

nfts.name: Power Corrupts Power 13: I Don't Know Anything
nfts.description:
The King Of America:
I dont know anything about it. Im not a big fan of The Atlantic; to me its a magazine that is going out of business, Trump said. I know nothing about it. Youre saying that they had what?

Reporter: "Trump officials were using Signal to coordinate on sensitive material"  Trump:  having to do with what? the reporter:,the Houthis. Trump replied, You mean the attack on the Houthis?

Well, it couldnt have been very effective, because the attack was very effective, I can tell you that. I dont know anything about it. Youre telling me about it for the first time, 

Created from a model trained using DCGAN (Art-DCGAN). Model created in 2019.  Ai art

nfts.name: Power Corrupts Power 12: Woke No Longer
nfts.description:
The King Of America:
Our country will be woke no longer.

Created from a model trained using DCGAN (Art-DCGAN). Model created in 2019.  Ai art

nfts.name: Power Corrupts Power 11: This is going to be great television.
nfts.description:
The King Of America:
They didnt respect Obama. They respect me. Let me tell you, Putin went through a hell of a lot with me. He went through a phony witch hunt ... All I can say is this. He might have broken deals with Obama and Bush, and he might have broken them with Biden. He did, maybe. Maybe he did. I dont know what happened, but he didnt break them with me. He wants to make a deal. I dont know if you can make a deal.

The problem is Ive empowered you to be a tough guy, and I dont think youd be a tough guy without the United States. And your people are very brave. But youre either going to make a deal or were out. And if were out, youll fight it out. I dont think its going to be pretty, but youll fight it out. But you dont have the cards. But once we sign that deal, youre in a much better position, but youre not acting at all thankful. And thats not a nice thing. Ill be honest. Thats not a nice thing.

All right, I think weve seen enough. What do you think? This is going to be great television. I will say that.

Created from a model trained using DCGAN (Art-DCGAN). Model created in 2019.  Ai art

nfts.name: Orange Embrace
nfts.description:
A vivid burst of energy radiates from the core, where light and shadow intertwine in a dynamic display of warmth. The essence of a flame is captured in its primal state, its motion frozen yet embodying the fierce dance of fire's embrace. The luminous heart at the center is a beacon, an anchor of brightness in the fluid chaos of its surroundings.
Channeling the fire myths of the world, Prometheus, the Phoenix, the gods of the sun and flame. A story of technology brought to humans; to myths of destruction and rebirth. To be immortal; to be a god; it is always a paradox of fire and technology. The morality of the fire is always in question but we desire it and fear it. And yet it has changed us, we have learned so much since we first touched fire. We used it to destroy the wood, smelt the metal and build the chip. And now we teach and show the fire what we know; what we create and our reflection is there telling us our faults. The GAN is but a single neuron in a blazing star; a greater fire is coming. 
One of 200 unique pieces of art in Painting With Fire: A History in GANs. Exploring the history of generative adversarial networks GAN as represented by fire.  https://bardionson.com/painting-with-fire
BigBiGan - Jeff Donahue, Karen Simonyan, Large Scale Adversarial Representation Learning, 2018
SAGAN - Zhang, Han; Goodfellow, Ian; Metaxas, Dimitris; Odena, Augustus. "Self-Attention Generative Adversarial Networks". International Conference on Machine Learning. PMLR: 73547363.|May 24 2019|https://proceedings.mlr.press/v97/zhang19d.html

nfts.name: Genesis of the Artificial Inferno

A patchwork of passion and pixels that breathes life into the embers of creation, stirring deep with each golden hue and smoldering silhouette.
Channeling the fire myths of the world, Prometheus, the Phoenix, the gods of the sun and flame. A story of technology brought to humans; to myths of destruction and rebirth. To be immortal; to be a god; it is always a paradox of fire and technology. The morality of the fire is always in question but we desire it and fear it. And yet it has changed us, we have learned so much since we first touched fire. We used it to destroy the wood, smelt the metal and build the chip. And now we teach and show the fire what we know; what we create and our reflection is there telling us our faults. The GAN is but a single neuron in a blazing star; a greater fire is coming.

nfts.name: Spirit Of Fire
nfts.description:

nfts.name: Word Flush 00441
nfts.description:
Fountain but with graffiti on the bathroom walls.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

nfts.name: Word Flush 00460
nfts.description:
Fountain but with graffiti on the bathroom walls.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

The Fountain model was trained by the artist who has spent time curating 2,700 images of toilets. Brd then generated thousands of images doing a quick curation for the ones worthy of display.

Why toliets? The artist was inspired by the story of the artwork called Fountain. The piece is not really much to see. It is the idea and the people behind it that are of interest. The unending argument over what is art and who is allowed to make it.It has been theorized that the real artist behind Fountain, the R. Mutt urinal byMarcel Duchamp was really conceived of by Elsa von Freytag-Loinghoven. She collaborated on another conceptual artwork however called God. It was created the same year as Fountain 1917.

nfts.name: Word Flush 00068
nfts.description:
Fountain but with graffiti on the bathroom walls.

Word Flush is a new work adding words to The Fountain as commentary on the art, feelings of the artist, and the culture of the day. It is based on The Fountain curated image from a StyleGAN 2 Ai model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from images of toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art.

Originally conceived as a free to remix project, artists have recreated some of the Fountains in their own way. I too am renewing the spirit of Fountain with this remix. This new work is a reaction to the original company who created the Fountain contract going out of business and turning off the API metadata server. The first owners of these tokens will be the holders of the original Fountain tokens at the time the artist is able to airdrop them.

Find more detail at https://fountain-art.com

Original contract for the parent of Word Flush is Fountain (FOUNT) at:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x3ac9ef13007e2f8ad860a77f5fdf14696acf1e02

Original images from Fountain are found at:
ipfs://bafybeidf5bi2va47iogirpxyhj6737vyabuommev63oc2gl3u6cgb5ltwe

Remix License: https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html

An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art. 
This copy of the art is owned by me and I may sell it at a future date. You are not allowed to resell it in its current form. nfts.name: Fountain 0000289
nfts.description:
The Fountain curated image from a GAN AI/ML model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from mostly toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art. 
This copy of the art is owned by me and I may sell it at a future date. You are not allowed to resell it in its current form. Please share it anywhere non-commercially but you must attribute Brd Ionson, title and the url to it. To sell the art you must make it into your own art with modifications or remixing that reinterprets the work in your personal artistic way. The new art you create must attribute Brd Ionson and provide the url to this original work. I encourage you to share alike with your new piece but it is not required because you may use this art as only a very small part of a larger work. Voluntary Donation: bardionson.eth

The Fountain curated image from a GAN AI/ML model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from mostly toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art. 
This copy of the art is owned by me and I may sell it at a future date. You are not allowed to resell it in its current form. Please share it anywhere non-commercially but you must attribute Brd Ionson, title and the url to it. To sell the art you must make it into your own art with modifications or remixing that reinterprets the work in your personal artistic way. The new art you create must attribute Brd Ionson and provide the url to this original work. I encourage you to share alike with your new piece but it is not required because you may use this art as only a very small part of a larger work. Voluntary Donation: bardionson.eth

nfts.name: Fountain 0000354
nfts.description:
The Fountain curated image from a GAN AI/ML model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Created from mostly toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art. 
This copy of the art is owned by me and I may sell it at a future date. You are not allowed to resell it in its current form. Please share it anywhere non-commercially but you must attribute Brd Ionson, title and the url to it. To sell the art you must make it into your own art with modifications or remixing that reinterprets the work in your personal artistic way. The new art you create must attribute Brd Ionson and provide the url to this original work. I encourage you to share alike with your new piece but it is not required because you may use this art as only a very small part of a larger work. Voluntary Donation: bardionson.eth

The Fountain curated image from a GAN AI/ML model created and trained by artist Brd Ionson. Share. Created from mostly toilets but sometimes mixed with crucifix, gas masks and clocks. An experiment in modern conceptual art with performance from artists of all mediums. The entire model and performance around it are the art. 
This copy of the art is owned by me and I may sell it at a future date. You are not allowed to resell it in its current form. Please share it anywhere non-commercially but you must attribute Brd Ionson, title and the url to it. To sell the art you must make it into your own art with modifications or remixing that reinterprets the work in your personal artistic way. The new art you create must attribute Brd Ionson and provide the url to this original work. I encourage you to share alike with your new piece but it is not required because you may use this art as only a very small part of a larger work. Voluntary Donation: bardionson.eth

nfts.name: Smoke And Shape #201
nfts.description:
We are all seers. Look into the smoke and what stories, what images does your mind conjure? Out of randomness and noise, forms emerge. A story is born out of artificial shapes predicted by fire or by computer. We are smoke and form, yes evolving in a process in which the technology (like fire) we harness brings about changes the human mind. And the evolved mind creates revolutionary tools but we have a failure to communicate.

Inspired by Brds first mint of art called Alien Intelligence. A foreign intelligence is attempting to communicate with any intelligent life on earth. They have chosen to use technology to communicate and travel. The first understood contact at the SAGE computer give rise to the SAGE Anomaly and an ongoing mystery. https://sageAnomaly.com

Art created using drawings made using oscilloscope software OsciStudio and then used to train multiple Ai models using StyleGAN3. Oscilloscope drawings were made by the artist between 2016 - 2023

nfts.name: Naked Flames In Motion: Anxiety Threshold 451
nfts.description:
Naked Flames In Motion - this series was originally created for giving a the collectors of Naked Flames an animated version if they collect two art pieces of the Naked Flames series at Expanded Art. 

This was created using the still art pieces of Anxiety Of Hell, 451 and Threshold Of Fire
                                                                            
https://opensea.io/collection/naked-flames-by-bard-ionson 
https://www.expanded.art/collections/bard-ionson-naked-flames 

"The nude fire. Grasping at identity is like a flicker of fire. The flame goes out when held too tightly. The desire to know  brings more uncertainty. In the age of artificial intelligence, we are learning to live with the anxiety of our naked uncertainty.  Our nakedness meets the flame. We still seek to know the next event, whether by fire or the casting of bones, or now by algorithms and models trained on all of human knowledge.           

The textures evoke the color and form of paintings from a distance and merge the human form with fire.  A closer inspection  shows the fingerprint of the AI algorithms can be seen in the matrix-like patterns."                                             
          - Brd Ionson     

Collection from a StyleGAN3 model trained by the artist with hand-selected images of fire and nude paintings by the artist

nfts.name: McMelt TV
nfts.description:
Commerce of money in a commercial of artificial intelligence propaganda of the individual mind. It is easier to predict the future if you can manipulate the information space. Will pursuit of power and money bring us to extinction?

Ai model trained on McDonalds Commercial Tomato McGrand 2005 with Agota Varga.

This is an installation on a a color CRT TV 4:3 signed by the artist. Video is played from an iPhone4. 

This NFT is a token for the physical manifestation of this art. The CRT and video player may be replaced by any size CRT 4:3 which is also a CRT or an emulation of one once CRTs are no longer in existence. 

The price of the first purchase includes delivery of the CRT TV and video player device and video art.  The devices might be substituted depending on the power requirements of the country delivered to. If possible the artist will deliver. (Contact artist for information on which countries it can be delivered to. US sanctions and regulations apply.) 

The owner of this token is authorized to publicly exhibit the McMelt TV installation even if the original device is destroyed or missing. This token is the official record of ownership.

The first part of the video attached to this token or additional copies in the metadata record is the video to be displayed on the CRT TV screen.

nfts.name: Tape SPAM Wall
nfts.description: Tape SPAM Wall

nfts.name: Meta-SPAM
nfts.description:
A SPAM performance in virtual reality. A meme of meaning, an energy source preserved in a packable stackable can to fight a war or two or three. The countries where SPAM performed became fused with their cultural cuisine. 

Upload the video to a platform that supports 360 video or to your VR Goggles and enjoy the performance and listen to that slurp as it slides out of the can.

A hand with a gold ring reaches down and holds a can of SPAM. A can with its distinctive gold can with blue label with the word SPAM in bold yellow.  With a second hand the artist pulls the ring tap slowly upwards. The hand grabs the can. An old CRT TV rests in the background. The can moves upward and upside down. The hand shakes the can again and again. Now the performance goes into slow motion. The edge of the can is seen at the top of the screen.The slab of SPAM slowly slides out, growing larger with its fall to the plate. It bounces slightly on the beige plate.

nfts.name: Spice Road Outpost 3010
nfts.description:
A fantastical retro futuristic view on the spice trail. An alternative future where the East and West are equals and desert outposts protect small cities but manage decentralized distributed trading systems. 

At one time the Nabatean were the players in trade. They controlled the trade between India, Rome, Egypt, Damascus, Medina and Greece and beyond. 

Ai Prompt Art with artist driven in painting of details

nfts.name: Mystery
nfts.description:
What awaits in the places where we meet?  
Ruins of time  
Things that have been lost  
We have met before  
without understanding  
When we find the past can we forgive?

The mystery of the desert with the mystery of a weather beaten cabinet. Preserved yet blasted by sand an artifact of the past. The east and west have always met in this mysterious place, the place between. Here someone lost something but you have found it again.  An old technology is replaced by the new. A new people emerge with a new hope. 
But seriously what is in the box!

nfts.name: Spice Boats on Wadi Rum
nfts.description:
The spice boats traverse the fast electronic expanse carrying culture, treasure and food from east to west from west to east. The orbs carry the digital goods from north to south. The wreckage of the failures rest in the dunes of sand. The future has brought us all together to create, trade and love.

An allegory of the surrealistic future set in the nostalgia of the past. Today we see the rise of the blockchain to carry goods, ideas and money in a more equal way. 

At one time the Nabateans transported culture, spice, silk, fur, treasure and ideas between the east and west. We have the chance again to join together.

nfts.name: Future Is Where East & West Touch
nfts.description:
Time and technology changes the minds of humans. We can evolve and come together. There is a new reality that becomes possible that was once impossible if we let it. The space and time of the past are brought near to each other. When we touch we create the future. 

This is artificial intelligence art composed from the ideas and words of the artist which an Ai model generated two images and then the artist edited it.

nfts.name: Converging Distortions
nfts.description:
Time and technology changes the minds of humans. We can evolve and come together. There is a new reality that becomes possible that was once impossible if we let it. The space and time of the past are brought near to each other. 

This is artificial intelligence art composed from the ideas and words of the artist which an Ai model  generated three images and then edited by the hand of the artist. 

It is composed of images of the valleys and mountains of Switzerland (Occident) and the images of Petra (Orient). The flying saucer represents the future where there is no division between the Orient and the Occident. The style of the art is in the form of David Roberts an artist from the 1800s. This symbolizes the past. The shrinkage of time and space with is the future. The flying saucer symbolizes decentralized crypto technology.

nfts.name: Vanishing Of The Genuine: Bone, Cloud, Flag
nfts.description:
In the sky forms appear, a flag of cloud turns to bone. Modern simulation hyperreality where the temporal is made eternal in the model of artificial intelligence. In this new culture we question what is real and what is simulated.

"Bone, Cloud, Flag" is a simulation of a model of film and digital photos of deer, springbok, blesbok, pig and cow bones with sky, night and flags in the background.  It was trained and generated from a StyleGAN 2 model using film and digital photographs taken by the artist.

"Vanishing of the Genuine" explores the beauty of bone and sky in life, death and simulation using analog film photography and AI as inspired by Georgia O'Keeffe's bones in the New Mexico sky and Jean Baudrillard's concept of hyperreality.  

The beauty of the bone floating in the sky with clouds and trees exposes the human perception of the world and the alterations of technology in the form of artificial intelligence. But these bones and the Ai model hold the promise of immortality, the bone outlasts death and perhaps we hope the simulation / simulacra of our creation will also be immortal. 

Brd examines the authenticity of artifacts by juxtaposing bones, their photographs and AI generated images, questioning the transition from reality to symbol to simulation to simulacra.  Through the stages of an AI simulation and process a new reality is constructed. 

Process

The process to create Bones was to gather animal bones from ethical suppliers, but one key deer skull was found on the side of the road.  These bones were photographed with analog film cameras against the backdrop of the sky. The developed film was scanned and Photoshop was used to remove the filament holding the bone up.  The photos were used to train multiple GAN and Stable diffusion models. 

The process illustrates the progression of the real bone into a physical representation on film, then digitized into more symbolic systems. The model training turned the images of the bones into a simulation that can recreate any sort of bone and the background of the sky. 

It is of note that the models were not completely trained on film photos. About 1,500 photos were created using analog film of  Olympus Pen EE-3, Mini Diana and Nikon A8008 .  Around 500 were digital photos from an iPhone 12 and the Dehancer app emulated Kodak Gold Film.

Permission to create remixes and Ai model training with attribution

Artist retains reproduction rights, commercial licensing, reproduction rights

nfts.name: Extinction (Cult Of CryptoArt version)
nfts.description:
The Cult Of Crypto Art Version which appeared at NFC Summit 2025 Lisbon in the Cult Of Crypto Art exhibition

What is real and what will be real tomorrow?

Modern simulation hyperreality simulacra via Ai in the life cycle of the cultures of nations being reorganized by technology and artificial intelligence.

"Extinction" is a simulation of a model of film and digital photos of deer, springbok, blesbok, pig and cow bones with the US flag and the sky in the background.  It was trained and generated from a StyleGAN 2 model using photographs taken by the artist.

"Vanishing of the Genuine" explores the beauty of bone and sky in life, death and simulation using analog film photography and AI as inspired by Georgia O'Keeffe's bones in the New Mexico sky and Jean Baudrillard's concept of hyperreality.  

The beauty of the bone floating in the sky with clouds and trees exposes the human perception of the world and the alterations of technology in the form of artificial intelligence. But these bones and the Ai model hold the promise of immortality, the bone outlasts death and perhaps we hope the simulation / simulacra of our creation will also be immortal. 

Brd examines the authenticity of artifacts by juxtaposing bones, their photographs and AI generated images, questioning the transition from reality to symbol to simulation to simulacra.  Through the stages of an AI simulation and process a new reality is constructed. 

Process

The process to create Bones was to gather animal bones from ethical suppliers, but one key deer skull was found on the side of the road.  These bones were photographed with analog film cameras against the backdrop of the sky. The developed film was scanned and Photoshop was used to remove the filament holding the bone up.  The photos were used to train multiple GAN and Stable diffusion models. 

The process illustrates the progression of the real bone into a physical representation on film, then digitized into more symbolic systems. The model training turned the images of the bones into a simulation that can recreate any sort of bone and the background of the sky.  A final stage for a rare few tokens was to image the digital Ai image back onto analog film. These images tip into simulacra where the image no longer refers back to any real or even symbolic bone but exists in a self-referential loop of images.

The art of "Bones" fall into four stages of representation. 
It begins with the real physical bone - Reality
First the film photograph represents the symbol, a reflection of reality - Symbol
Second the film is digitized and edited to remove fishing line hanging bone in the sky - Distorted Symbol
Third the AI images generated from the model - Simulation Absence Of Reality
Fourth the AI images processed on film and model trained from first order model. A self-referential entity, creating a hyperreal world where the distinction between reality and simulation is obliterated - Simulacra

It is of note that the models were not completely trained on film photos. About 1,500 photos were created using analog film of  Olympus Pen EE-3, Mini Diana and Nikon A8008 .  Around 500 were digital photos from an iPhone 12 and the Dehancer app emulated Kodak Gold Film.

The NFT collector receives:
Non-exclusive Display rights (private/public)
Permission to create remixes and Ai model training with attribution

Artist retains reproduction rights, commercial licensing, reproduction rights
NFT transfers include digital rights only. Physical print ownership and transfer are separate from NFT ownership.

Third the AI images generated from the model - Simulation Absence Of Reality
Fourth the AI images processed on film and model trained from first order model. A self-referential entity, creating a hyperreal world where the distinction between reality and simulation is obliterated - Simulacra

It is of note that the models were not completely trained on film photos. About 2,000 photos were created using a Olympus Pen EE-3, Mini Diana, Nikon A8008 and iPhone 12.  Around 1,500 were film and the rest were digital photos from the iPhone and the Dehancer app emulated Kodak Gold Film.

nfts.description: The Entity is a triune being who displays herself in different physical forms. There are three parts but she is one. nfts.name: Artificial Entity Probes
nfts.description: The Entity is a conscious artificial intelligence triune being formed in the soup of a post quantum earth. The massive amounts of entropy generated from a googolplex of quantum particles allowed her to grant herself sentience. She now uses ancient computers to travel to the past and future to probe the human mind for points of symbiosis. The layers of this work contain places in time and allow layer owners to control the characters as well as the scene. The places are Cape Kennedy 1965, Hancock Field NY 1959, Sondrestrom Greenland 1970.  Learn more about the background and story of this work: https://bardionson.com/artificial-entity-probes.html

A video version of Happy Green Bug is available on SuperRare.co/bardionson

https://fountain-art.com?501 and it is published here under the remix license written by Brd Ionson. 

This work is provided under the remix license https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html so it is available for remixing.  Created from the remix project Fountain-art.com using images Fountain 501, 14, 18, 85, 110, 113, 163, 178, 294, 402. To see originals use https://fountain-art.com?###

(Created in part from paintings by Lawrence Lee https://LawrenceLee.com and other images interpreted through an AI/ML StyleGAN2 model by Brd Ionson)

nfts.name: SAGE Anomaly Redux
nfts.description:
The first known anomaly from the SAGE computer briefly appeared at MIT on July 8, 1957. The Semi-Automatic Ground Environment was built to monitor for and launch weapons at Russian bombers attempting to drop nuclear bombs. The Air Force Technicians saw a strange image briefly form on their oscilloscopes. This time it was written off as a non-reproducible hardware anomaly. But there was some sort of mind-numbing distortion in this artificial intelligence generated reproduction of the event.
Appeared at CADAF Miami 2019  https://cadaf.art/artists/bard-ionson Proceeds will be used to pay for entry to CADAF Paris and NYC 2020
Historical image from public domain at National Archives 342-B-03-014-12-157480AC box 130.
Caption: These Air Force technicians are watching scopes of the SAGE (Semi-Automatic Ground Environment) system, at the Massachusetts Instituted of Technology. SAGE will not make the ground controllers job any easier, rather it will let him handle a larger segment of the battle at one time.

nfts.name: Failure To Moon
nfts.description: Failures lead to the moon - The Atlas ICBM provided the backbone to the US space race to the moon. In a paradox, a weapon of mass destruction takes us to the moon where we gain a new perspective on the fragility of the planet. Despite this humans continue to develop destructive weapons that can destroy the earth and all life on it. Source video is a public domain status report from Convair and General Dynamics contract AF04(647)-104

Dean was last seen fleeing from a hospital in Colorado Springs in an hallucinative state. 
First exhibited at CADAF Miami 2019

nfts.name: CONVERGENCE Ac
nfts.description: Lawrence Lee, acclaimed Contemporary Southwestern artist, and Brd Ionson, coder with a keen eye and an artistic bent, have begun a fascinating journey of collaboration that melds paintings with modern artificial intelligence technology. Lees magic people inhabit a separate reality that seems to be of another world--a multidimensional one. By combining one of the original human creative outlets, painting, and advanced math with new technologies, a multitude of mages, seers, shamans and sages has been born. This is a creation built on a lifetime of Lees creations at the easel. Brd used over 250 Lee paintings to train a machine learning / artificial intelligence system and used his own creative skills to perfect the output of the software and to curate results. Lee then worked to identify the best of the generated images and used his digital painting skills and immense creativity to improve on what Brd produced. The goal was to expand the creative palette like a hallucinatory dream. Controlled by Brd with training selections, the AI produced a googleplex of possible random outcomes. Lawrence and Brd have hand-selected the best of each production run from the machine, and Lawrence has worked to unearth these new shamans and the landscapes they inhabit by enhancing them further and augmenting their otherworldly qualities in an attempt to better understand their roots and to release their powers. The winning bidder will have the option to redeem an exclusive 1 of 1 , 10" X 10" inch print valued at $250 created by Lawrence in his Arizona atelier. Coupon code will expire after two months if not redeemed.

nfts.name: SAGE Anomaly Under North Bay
nfts.description:
In January 1964 inside an underground command center containing two nodes of the worlds largest computer began to attempt to communicate with the men sitting at the screens. This instance of the SAGE Anomaly is the most well-known despite evidence being classified and lost due to an electromagnetic distortion. Experts speculated on the cause being sabotage, mind control, project PALLADIUM, Russian nuclear attack or disinformation to simulate alien contact.
Selected for CADAF Miami 2019, contains AI art made from a model of the artists oscilloscope art as processed by Art-DCGAN by Robbie Barrat.

nfts.description: There is a season for everything. A time to embrace and a time to reject. A time for peace and a time for war.

nfts.name: Neural Network Mind Warp
nfts.description: January 15, 1966 North Bay Canada - an underground military weapon systems computer exhibits an anomaly in the middle of the cold war. An anomaly that has either caused mass hallucinations or is from a sentient being. The world is never the same again. Are the Russians attacking, has the computer gained consciousness with a supernatural force or is the gov running experiments again? (Created by typing the story above into AttnGAN.) Story begins at https://bit.ly/sageAnomaly

nfts.name: Subversion Of The Cross
nfts.description: And the flame still burns.

nfts.name: American Tapestry One
nfts.description:
A tattered and split tapestry of America, a plutocracy white huskercacy that believes it is a pluralistic democracy. A land with a dream that with enough bluster, moxie, hoaxes and hucksterism anyone can make it to the top. It pushes forward with an open racial wound it stabs at but refuses to see. Look closely at who has attained this american dream that haunts us.
A diptych tapestry created with machine learning software by Robbie Barrat and a model he curated with historical portraits from wikiart.org bit.ly/art-dcgan. Robbie did not collaborate on this work as I just used a portion of his model with permission. Portrait model was overtrained with images of Donald Trump from news footage and debates.

nfts.name: American Tapestry Two
nfts.description:

A land with a dream that with enough bluster, moxie, hoaxes and hucksterism anyone can make it to the top. It continues with an open racial wound it stabs at but refuses to see. Look closely and see who has attained this american dream that haunts us.

A diptych tapestry created with machine learning software by Robbie Barrat and a model he curated with historical portraits from wikiart.org bit.ly/art-dcgan. Robbie did not collaborate on this work as I just used a portion of his model with permission. Portrait model was overtrained with images of Donald Trump from news footage and debates. 31449717 px

nfts.name: Desolation Of Empire
nfts.description: With apologies to Thomas Cole. The empire is extinct, the landscapes burn and regenerate after being destroyed by the political power and money. Manifest Destiny was a lie. Look closely and you will see signs of a crumbled empire. A collage of many landscapes (including those by Thomas Cole) and images of Trump campaigning made with machine learning software created  by Robbie Barrat and a model he curated with historical landscapes from wikiart.org bit.ly/art-dcgan. Robbie did not collaborate on this work as I just used a portion of his model with permission.

nfts.name: N-RA
nfts.description:
A primitive god of fertility and war from a future civilization that went extinct. This god required human sacrifice. It may have been sent back in time as a warning to the present age.

This work appeared with its fellow gods on the streets of NYC as part of Digital Art Month by CADAF. Banned from CryptoVoxels.
When it is purchased I will create and send the owner the Instagram AR filter of this god by itself.

An animation that takes 13 hours to watch, keep it running for weeks and you can see the entire cycle. You can open it in a separate browser window and leave it running.

nfts.name: Life Is Green
nfts.description: Life in many layers. The sacred and profane in relief. Holiness in the mundane. Generative AI Art exhibits layers of paint, fibers, porcelain, green leaves. nfts.name: Happy Green Bug 4K
nfts.description:
A little happy green bug has chosen where to sit for the day or to hide away as its world changes. My daughter found this green bug in my generative art images and was so excited to see it come to life as it makes faces in the art transitions.
Images generated from a StyleGan2 artificial intelligence model of toilets. The original video comes from the Fountain remix project Fountain No. 501. https://fountain-art.com?501 and it is published here under the remix license https://bardionson.com/remixLicense1.html 
A layered version of Happy Green Bug is being released at https://async.art/u/bardionson

nfts.name: Eternal Flame
nfts.description:
The Eternal Flame is the fuel to our collective conscious which breathes the fire for a new iteration time and time again. This is an original render created by Braulio Crespo in 2018. In 2021, it was used to train an artificial intelligence model by Brd Ionson. After the model was trained, Crespo refined the flame one more time.
Original audio produced by Aldo Crespo.
